title: In God's hands
creator_credit: Zalman King, Tom Stern and Tri-Star Pictures
brief_description: In God’s Hands follows three friends and surfers around the world in their quest for the perfect wave. They travel to Madagascar, Mexico, Bali and Hawaii where their training is put to the test when faced with 40 foot waves travelling at 35 miles per hour. Includes stunning water photography by Sonny Miller. Cast includes: Patrick Shane Dorian, Matt George, Matty Liu and Shaun Tomson.
